subject: Re: [junit] Re: Help! Stack trace truncated
msgSnippet: ... if you call the  task in you Ant build script you can try by invoking junit.textui.TestRunner with a  task directly. -Vladimir -- Vladimir R.
messageBody:
> After looking through the JUnit source code, I'm pretty sure it's not
> JUnit. It may, however, be Ant's xml writer, but the same truncation
> happens whether I use Ant's xml writer or the plain writer. I can't
> find a setting for Ant that describes truncating output. JUnit's
> limit is called maxmessage, but I have it set to -1 so that it won't
> truncate.

if you call the <junit> task in you Ant build script you can try by invoking
junit.textui.TestRunner with a <java> task directly.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
